Cape Fear Script - Dialogue Transcript

Voila! Finally, the Cape Fear script is here for all you quotes spouting fans of the movie directed by Martin Scorsese starring Nick Nolte, Robert De Niro, Juliette Lewis, Jessica Lange, etc. This script is a transcript that was painstakingly transcribed using the screenplay and/or viewings of Cape Fear. I know, I know, I still need to get the cast names in there and I'll be eternally tweaking it, so if you have any corrections, feel free to drop me a line. You won't hurt my feelings. Honest. Swing on back to Drew's Script-O-Rama afterwards for more free movie scripts!
